subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
lead_paragraph: Tony Stewart’s victory at Martinsville, Va., moved him to second place, 8 points behind Carl Edwards, with three races left in the Nascar Chase for the Sprint Cup.
snippet: Tony Stewart’s victory at Martinsville, Va., moved him to second place, 8 points behind Carl Edwards, with three races left in the Nascar Chase for the Sprint Cup.
